- Fix extension removes the original HTML language support

## 0.4.3
- Test Slim snippets
## 0.4.2
- fix template name from html to erb
## 0.4.1
- fix member and collection space problem
## 0.4.0
- routes

  - add collection block
- html.erb
  - change to
    - pre
    - pre-
    - preb
    - preb-
## 0.3.5

## 0.3.4
- update if snippets prefix for Ruby
## 0.3.3

- add if snippet
